snippet: The killer of Phoolan Devi, a lawmaker who was once an infamous outlaw known as the Bandit Queen, was sentenced Thursday to life in prison for shooting Ms. Devi.
abstract: Sher Singh Rana is sentenced to life in prison for 2001 murder of Indian lawmaker Phoolan Devi.
lead_paragraph: The killer of Phoolan Devi, a lawmaker who was once an infamous outlaw known as the Bandit Queen, was sentenced Thursday to life in prison for shooting Ms. Devi.

headline.main: India: Life Sentence for Killer of Outlaw-Turned-Lawmaker
headline.print_headline: India: Life Sentence for Killer of Outlaw-Turned-Lawmaker
